basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Frontend Developer | Vue.js • React • TypeScript
basics.summary: Dedicated Frontend Developer with 3+ years of production experience in Vue.js, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. Proven track record of delivering responsive, performant web applications with a focus on clean, maintainable code.

work.name: BigFoot Company
highlights: Developed responsive landing page and dashboard using Nuxt.js, Vue 3, and TypeScript
Implemented multi-step workflows with Vuetify and Pinia state management
Ensured cross-browser compatibility and responsive design

work.name: DevelBox
highlights: Led frontend migration from Vue 2 to Vuetify, improving page load times by 25%
Developed responsive web interfaces using Vue.js ecosystem technologies
Collaborated closely with UI/UX team to implement pixel-perfect designs
Performed code reviews and mentored junior developers

work.name: TraineeLand
highlights: Built responsive web pages using WordPress and Elementor
Implemented clean HTML, CSS, and JavaScript interactions

projects.name: AdCognition
projects.description: Chrome extension for real-time ad detection with ML capabilities
highlights: Developed production Chrome extension with 90%+ detection accuracy
Implemented responsive, performant web application architecture
